about_the_game:
■Orthodox Fantasy Monsters

This collection includes a variety of familiar monsters commonly found in orthodox fantasy settings. It features 83 different types of creatures, including humanoids, animals, insects, reptiles, spirits, demons, and machines.

■Various patterns for different situations

The size and orientation with front and side views are adjusted. In addition, many of them are drawn with completely different graphics for each.
Each monster has two different color variations.
Also, you can choose between versions with and without ground shadows!

Contents
With Ground Shadows:
 enemies: 180
 sv_enemies: 180

・This pack is for use in RPG Maker Series or the engine of your choice.
・OK to be used in Commercial projects made in RPG Maker
・Rights must be indicated when using assets.
・You may modify some of the assets (but not redistribute them) for your own game use only.
・All copyrights, neighboring rights, and all other rights to this material belong to the creator or a third party authorized by the creator.


Without Ground Shadows:
 enemies: 180
 sv_enemies: 180
